All Implemented Interfaces:
IWorkbenchShellHandler
public class SaveResourceShellHandler
extends AbstractYesToCloseShellHandler

Shell handler for the Shell Monitor that will handle a shell that may or may not pop and is to be disposed without failing the test. This handler will specifically click the "Yes" button when the "Save Resource?" option dialog is shown
